name: Treant
description: A towering, sentient tree-like creature with bark-like skin, branches for arms, and roots for legs, standing over 20 feet tall.
memorable: The Treant's ability to animate trees and blend in with its surroundings makes it a formidable guardian of the forest.
goals: To protect its woodland home and maintain harmony with nature.
relations: Usually found in the company of other forest creatures; can communicate with beasts and plants.
environment: Typically found in forests and natural landscapes.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength and durability, coupled with the ability to animate plants for combat.
weaknesses: Susceptible to fire damage, which can significantly weaken it.
attacks: The Treant performs slam attacks with massive strength and can throw boulders, dealing heavy bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to animate trees and plants to fight alongside it, creating difficult terrain for enemies.
additional_information: Can blend into surroundings with False Appearance.
Deals double damage to objects and structures as a Siege Monster.
Pervasively wise, able to communicate effectively with forest life.
